name: Bulls Hit
description:
Trapped in the Arena you must evade both the angry Bull and Guards. Survive long enough and you might just make it out alive. Joined together in a deadly Fight, you may make an unlikely Ally.

Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to control the red Character and don't get hit by the Guards or the Bull.

Big Thanks to Elthen for his Pixel-Art and to Freesounds for the ... well, free Sounds.
